revised_title: A Study of Fossil Plants from the Coal Measures: The Asterophyllites
tldr: The author examines the organization and structure of fossil plants from the coal measures, specifically focusing on the Asterophyllites genus. The study reveals the development of the plants through successive exogenous growths, transforming the young twigs into branches and stems. The author also discusses the unique features of the plants' vascular systems and barks.
